# InnovatEPAM Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-02-25

## Active Technologies

- Java 21 (backend), JavaScript ES2023+ (frontend via React 18+) + Spring Boot 3.x, Spring Security 6.x, Spring Data JPA, PostgreSQL driver, BCrypt, JWT (jjwt), Springdoc OpenAPI (backend); React 18+, Vite 5+, Tailwind CSS 3.x, Axios, React Router (frontend) (001-user-auth)

## Project Structure

```text
backend/
frontend/
tests/
```

## Commands

npm test; npm run lint

## Code Style

Java 21 (backend), JavaScript ES2023+ (frontend via React 18+): Follow standard conventions
